titles.title: SUSALPS Conference 2018 – Book of Abstracts: Montane and alpine grasslands under climate change – ways in a sustainable future

contributor.affiliation: Karlsruhe Institute für Technologie, Institut für Meteorologie und Klimafor-schung, IMK-IFU, Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Deutschland

descriptions.description: From 18 to 20 September 2018, the SUSALPS Conference "Montane and alpine grasslands under climate change – ways in a sustainable future" was held in Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Germany. More than 60 participants from nine nations attended the conference. The event covered a broad scope and offered the opportunity to discuss both fundamental research and practical approaches in grassland management. At the conference's closing day, ex-cursions took place to the SUSALPS experimental areas in Fendt and on the Brunnenkopfalm. This publication provides the abstracts of all oral and poster presentations.
